Title: Relates to notice of small claims judgments and indexing of unpaid claims
Summary: Relates to notice of small claims judgments and indexing of unpaid claims; provides for the interception of income tax refunds to satisfy an outstanding small claims judgement.
LawSection: New York City Civil Court Act
LawCode: Amd §1811, NYC Civ Ct Act; amd §1811, UCCA; amd §1811, UDCA; amd §1811, UJCA; add §171-x, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city civil court act, the uniform city court act, the uniform district court act, the uniform justice court act and the tax law, in relation to notice of small claims judgments and indexing of unpaid claims
